reviews.text: i stayed at the hotel for 2 nights. it was fantastic. the hotel is located in massive area which is 20-30mins drive from hampi city. but the distance did not bother me. actually, it was quite nice to be bit far from hampi city, as it was peaceful and quiet. there were many animals in the hotel area. we walked a lot within the hotel and it took us nearly one hour! such a beautiful scenary!
reviews.title: unique place

reviews.text: negative point of the hotel was maybe food. it was just average. ( i live in india and i have eaten much better food before)and there is a swimming pool, but it was too dirty for me to swim. but there were some people who are swmimming, so it depends on you.
reviews.title: What a Treat!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: anyway, i can say this is somewhere very special and i would love to come back again.
reviews.title: The best option but...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had come across reviews of Boulders in travel guides and so booked myself in.
reviews.title: Location, Location, Location

reviews.text: While this property is a lot more expensive than the typical back packer properties on the other side of the Tungabhadra, but the stay is completely worth it.
reviews.title: a pure delight
overrated
reviews.text: hampi's boulders is way overrated. the rooms are rundown and the place is in serious need of repair. like hampi itself it is not worht the trouble.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are visiting Vijaynagar, you absolutely must stay here. During the day, you can visit the busy sites of Vijaynagar. But after that, you can return to the relaxing oasis of Hampi Boulders Resort. The resort is absolutely serene. The only sounds you hear are the gurgling river and birds- there are no noises of cars or horns or trucks. The beautiful view consists of low mountains and enormous boulders.
reviews.title: An Oasis

likes.disliked: — its a little bit further away from the sites than altenate hotels

reviews.text: The manager (Vikram when we visited) was incredibly helpful as was the rest of the staff. Services was prompt and efficient. The food was very tasty as well. The room was basic and clean with a nice verandah to relax on.
reviews.title: A super get away!

likes.disliked: — really, there wasn't anything - it isn't glitzy, but this is a great place

reviews.text: The resort is a 15 minute journey from the main sites of Vijaynagar. The resort provides transport.
reviews.title: Far Off but worth it!

reviews.text: The location reminds me of New Mexico or Colorado.
reviews.title: The Moab, Utah of India!
